deploymentModule.description: Deployment binding the apache server and the test client node(s).

image.description: Apache web server appliance with custom landing page (Please ensure that port 8080 is open in your security group named "default")
image.name: examples/tutorials/service-testing-windows/apache

image.description: Windows web client tests server connectivity and verifies content (For Exoscale: Please ensure that port 5985 is open in your security group named "default")
image.name: examples/tutorials/service-testing-windows/client

parameter.description: Port on which the web server listens
parameter.name: webserver.port
